original_text: For because thou hast trusted in thy works and in thy treasures, thou shalt also be taken: and Chemosh shall go forth into captivity with his priests and his princes together.
korean_text: 네가 네 업적과 보물을 의뢰하므로 너도 정복을 당할 것이요 그모스는 그의 제사장들과 고관들과 함께 포로되어 갈 것이라

sentences.original_text: For because thou hast trusted in thy works
and Chemosh shall go forth into captivity
with his priests and his princes together.
